Name: Merfolk Wayfinder
Story Background: The Wayfinders are dedicated to exploring new seas and charting uncharted waters for the betterment of all merfolk.
Ability: Whenever Merfolk Wayfinder enters the battlefield, you may scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
Appearance Description: A sleek, blue-scaled merfolk with a trident, adorned with seaweed and coral, and carrying a satchel of maps and navigation tools.
